name: Mercury Express
description: Journey to the closest planet to the Sun, Mercury. Experience extreme temperature variations and marvel at its unique surface.
highlights: Witness the scorching heat of the day side and the chilling cold of the night side. Explore Mercury's craters and vast plains.

name: Venus Enigma
description: Venture to the second planet from the Sun, Venus. Explore its thick, toxic atmosphere and volcanic landscapes.
highlights: Witness Venus's intense greenhouse effect and visit its volcanoes. Experience the mystery of our "sister planet."

name: Earth Orbit Experience
description: Experience the beauty of Earth from orbit. Take a journey to the International Space Station (ISS) and float in microgravity.
highlights: See the Earth from a unique perspective, conduct experiments in microgravity, and live aboard the ISS like an astronaut.

name: Mars Odyssey
description: Experience the Red Planet like never before. Walk on the Martian surface and uncover its secrets.
highlights: Hike on Martian canyons, visit Olympus Mons, the tallest volcano in the solar system, and search for signs of past life.

name: Jupiter's Majesty
description: Fly to the largest planet in our solar system, Jupiter. Witness its massive storms and unique cloud patterns.
highlights: Observe Jupiter's iconic Great Red Spot, witness its turbulent atmosphere, and explore its many moons.

name: Saturn Ringscape
description: Journey to Saturn and marvel at its stunning ring system. Visit its intriguing moon, Titan, and explore the ringed giant.
highlights: Soar through Saturn's dazzling rings and explore its moon, Titan, with its lakes of liquid methane.

name: Uranus Expedition
description: Visit the ice giant Uranus and its peculiar tilted rings. Experience its icy atmosphere and unique features.
highlights: Witness Uranus's strange axial tilt, explore its rings, and study its chilly environment.

name: Neptune Odyssey
description: Travel to Neptune, the last of the gas giants. Explore its deep blue atmosphere and its mysterious storms.
highlights: Dive into Neptune's frigid winds, witness its dark storms, and experience the outermost planet in the solar system.

name: Sun Flyby
description: For the ultimate thrill-seekers, embark on a daring journey to the Sun. While you won't land, you'll fly closer to the Sun than ever before.
highlights: Experience the Sun's scorching heat and witness its massive solar flares and eruptions from a safe distance.

name: Pluto Discovery
description: Embark on an extraordinary journey to the dwarf planet Pluto. Explore the distant, icy world and its enigmatic surface.
highlights: Witness the far reaches of our solar system, explore Pluto's frozen landscapes, and study its complex geology.
